title: Fork, 17th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two pointed tines, neck oval in section. Tapered handle, ivory decorated with brass, three steel rivets on the handle, brass mounts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, 17th century.
17th century. steel, ivory, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-61.
